abstract: Publicist for Feiden Santana, bystander who took video of police shooting in South Carolina of Walter L Scott, says new outlets will now be charged one-time fee of $10,000 for showing it.
lead_paragraph: A publicist for Feidin Santana, who took the video of the shooting of Walter L. Scott by a police officer, says news outlets will be charged $10,000.

headline.main: Fee to Be Charged for Video of South Carolina Shooting, Publicist Says
headline.print_headline: Fee to Be Charged for Video of South Carolina Shooting, Publicist Says

snippet: A publicist for Feidin Santana, who took the video of the shooting of Walter L. Scott by a police officer, says news outlets will be charged $10,000.
